channel.title: R on Shiny クックブック

item.title: Shiny app 開発をスタート
item.description: Shiny って何？(読み飛ばしてオーケー) R は世界中で広く使用されているプログラミング言語です。Shiny は R のパッケージの一つで、R による分析結果

item.title: 索引(アルファベット順)
item.description: A actionButton B C checkboxGroupInput checkboxInput column D dateInput dateRangeInput E F fileInput flowLayout fluidPage G H htmlOutput I imageOutput J K L M mainPanel N navbarPage navlistPanel numericInput O P passwordInput plotOutput Q R radioButtons renderImage

item.title: 索引(機能別)
item.description: UI Inputs actionButton checkboxGroupInput checkboxInput dateInput dateRangeInput fileInput numericInput passwordInput radioButtons selectInput sliderInput textInput UI Outputs imageOutput htmlOutput plotOutput tableOutput textOutput uiOutput verbatimTextOutput UI Layout column flowLayout fluidPage mainPanel navbarPage navlistPanel sidebarLayout sidebarPanel splitLayout tabPanel tabsetPanel verticalLayout wellPanel Rendering functions renderImage renderPlot renderPrint renderTable renderText renderUI Reactive programming 参照 https://shiny.rstudio.com/reference/shiny/1.0.5/

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
